Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos homered in his first at bat
Nick Castellanos drew a two-out walk and scored the winning run in his penultimate plate appearance
Weston Wilson drove in the game-winning run
Pre-Game Insights: Rays' manager Kevin Cash sought out Nick Castellanos to apologize for intentionally throwing at him in the previous game
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos appreciated Kevin Cash's apology and respect for admitting foul play
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies' magic number to win their first N.L. East crown since 2011 is now nine
Three of the four losses in the last 18 games have come in games started by Taijuan Walker, Tyler Phillips, or Seth Johnson
Others: The Phillies are off on Thursday but resume play Friday in their penultimate home series of the season against the New York Mets
